评论概述: Nothing ever fits right and THIS FIT BEAUTIFULLY!!
评论详情: I am definitely xl and xxl in clothes and sometimes larger depending on the items. I am at my heaviest weight with major health issues last couple of years. A lot of sadness results in not being able to ever feel good in clothes or things I buy and wear and I live in robes bc nothing is ever comfortable for me. And I’ve gone through surgeries and always recovering.  We had a road trip. And I had to find something comfortable and fitting. I ordered several things. This was my favorite. When you are bigger in the chest and wider, dresses with the cross over top like this usually have the girls spilling out which is not always flattering or suitable for places. This fit amazingly and covered everything on top. It was SO comfortable. The green was darker than I anticipated but the fit made up for that. I want them in every color now. I highly recommend if you struggle w dresses. If you have a big bottom you can throw leggings on under and still it looks great both ways.
Simple dress with a nice neck cut. The black color is very flexible to dress it up or down , depending on the occasion.

Wore this for an outside wedding and received a lot of compliments! Very comfortable and flattering style!

评论概述: I have 5 of these dresses now!
评论详情: If you are looking for really cute flirty sexy comfy dress this is it. I bought 2 last year and they came out with new prints this year so I bought 3 more. The fabric is wonderful just wash on gentle and hang dry. Prints have not faded and the construction of the dress has held up nicely. You can adjust the dept of the vneck I personally like a deeper v. My husband loves the look. I am 36DD and my bust line looks great in these dresses. I wear a medium. Highly recommend these dresses.
This dress is super comfy and very flattering. Will probably be purchasing in more patterns.

Bought as a gift for my mom because she wears dresses 24/7 and she is OBSESSED!! The material is cotton and BARELY wrinkles. Super light material and my mom says this dress is very comfy!! (Btw it came vacuum sealed and when we opened it we let it hang for a couple mins and the wrinkles came out). My mom got a medium, she’s typically a size 6-8 depending on the brand, 5’1, 140lbs, and 34D!!

Super comfortable can dress and you can dress it up with high heels or a more casual look with a pair of flat sandals. Doesn't wrinkle at all it's going to be great for traveling!

评论概述: Fabric pills easily and fades with each wash
评论详情: I got the Floral-6 , X-Large. Looks just like the pic and fits perfectly. I'm a 42DD, so I wear a yellow cami since it shows a lot of cleavage due to my bust size, which is common with this style. I'm 4'10", so it's midi length on me, which is fine. It's not pleated, so it lays nicely; when you're curvy, pleats make you look much bigger, so it's a perfect style since it also comes in at the waist.  I originally loved this dress because of the fit and comfort, but I had to take 2 stars off for three poor quality. Maybe if it was only $10 I wouldn't be upset, but for $30+, it should not pill or fade so easily. It pilled with the first wear and faded with the first wash even though I washed it inside out in cold water and line dried it. Maybe the light colors won't look as worn out as quickly.

评论概述: Edited: Daughter thought navy floral dress was from Anthropologie but solid black is not as pictured
评论详情: … that says a lot! my daughter is very much opposed to fast fashion, so I was pleasantly surprised when she thought the large dark blue flowers on white print of this dress was Anthropologie. I was a bit skeptical of the polyester/spandex blend, but it feels pretty nice and soft. I need this for an upcoming business trip and when I ordered, the small — which is my recommended size — wasn’t going to arrive in time., but the medium was available for next day delivery. The waist of the medium firs well but the bust and armholes are a little big. Fortunately, I checked again and ordered the small since now it’s saying it will arrive in time for my trip  Update: I also bought this in solid black and it’s not as pictured so adjusting from 5 to 3 stars. The picture shows that the pockets on the solid black dress are sewn on the side seams and essentially invisible unless you put your hands in them like the model. The solid black dress I received had the pockets sewn off the seams which gave the dress a more casual feel and I didn’t like that, so solid black is going back
as advertised!
Love this dress. It looks great for casual or could be dressed up. Material is light and breathable. Love the pockets and it washes up very well.

I love the green one i ordered and it has pockets that was a nice surprise. Looks great and light weight for summer wear

I ordered this dress and a solid color, as I had already ordered a floral print and loved it. this dress came with hair and soiled, make up on it, as well as pilling. I will be returning it. Very disappointed.
This dress is comfortable, wrinkle free, fits great and I love the pockets! I am going to order in more colors as I can wear this work, going out with friends or to special occasions.

I wore this dress in Rome Italy and it was very hot.  The material of this dress was comfortable and it fit perfectly on me.  I would recommend this dress for anyone that would like a nice and comfortable outfit
